p: In the trade-off scenario, species richness remained equally high over much of parameter space; only for distributions with very small SM means and high SM variation, species numbers and diversity declined somewhat ( S2D and S2E Fig). Here, the regional community weighted mean seed mass relatively stably converged around the mean of the initial SM distribution, across different widths of the SM distribution ( S2F Fig). Seed mass diversity was maintained by an establishment-colonisation trade-off.
